content: Hop back onto the sands and slide past the rest of the Rat Archers until you reach the bottom of the Ravine. It’s here you’ll find another of the large stone doors that requires both items from the Vanguard bosses to proceed, and you may only have one by this point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rock Clash Platform'.
The content is as follows:
Hop back onto the sands and slide past the rest of the Rat Archers until you reach the bottom of the Ravine. It’s here you’ll find another of the large stone doors that requires both items from the Vanguard bosses to proceed, and you may only have one by this point.
